name: Hentai Monster Quiz
description:
This is a quiz game in which you can meet the beautiful 10 ladies. They will tell you about their life and love affairs. But if you want more, you have to answer a few of their questions. If you are ready to plunge into an exciting game, and prove yourself as a good listener, reliable partner and smart player, then you are waiting for.



Features:
1. 10 beautiful ladies. Each of their unique personality.
2. More than 10 questions for each of the girls.
3. Each girl has more than 8 items of clothing.
4. Use your thinking and memory to win the quiz.
5. Nice music, sound effects.
6. The game has been translated into many other languages.
